name: Combat Knife [3]
description: Knives specially used to kill enemies for the fighting purpose.

name: ComeOn Reindeer [1]
description: "Wait for him by opening the skylight, putting the socks by the bed, leaving the door unlocked. I was too excited to peep the result at night but fell asleep instead~ LaLaLa~ LaLaLaLa~ Red-nose Rudolph will pass my window tonight. Will stay for me this year? LaLaLa~LaLaLa~ Red-nose Rudolph carried a man. I want to see him before growing up. "

name: Composite Bow
description: A bow made of various materials can cause great injury which is its main feature.

description: A bow made of various materials can cause great injury which is its main feature.

name: Concert Invitation
description: My wishes, immortalized in ink and placed into your hands. I'm looking forward to meeting you again amid the music of my dreams.

name: Concert Support Giftbox
description: To thank the audience for their enthusiasm, the organizers of the concert have prepared some gifts. It's not that big, but it's brimming with sincerity.
